item.title: Internal Stock Adjustment Applet
item.description: The Internal Stock Adjustment Applet simplifies stock management by allowing users to adjust stock levels to match actual quantities. It supports creating, viewing, and bulk importing stock adjustments, ensuring accurate inventory tracking. It integrates with other applets to enhance operational efficiency.
